author: pipermerriam
content:
I would like to encourage teams and researchers to consider opening an issue in the current apprenticeship program repository with any project ideas you might have

https://github.com/ethereum-cdap/cohort-one/issues

This can be anything from data that needs to be gathered, to research and analysis that needs to be done.  Tools that would be useful.  Experiments you would like to see done.  This is a good chance to "hook" participants from the next cohort to work on your stuff.

author: jochembrouwer
content: Hi <@!360491619402776577>, from EIP 3860: "Currently, on London, with 30M gas limit, it would be possible to trigger jumpdest-analysis of a total ~1.3GB of initcode." I am wondering how it would be possible to trigger GBs of initcode? I'd get 7.5 MB when one creates a tx with only zeros in the calldata. (30.000.000/4) (4 gas per 0 byte). I also can't think of a way to do it via CREATE since you'd run into the quadratic gas scaling of memory.
